review: Very happy with my purchase. Had problem with sound. Was a quick fix by adjusting settings.
author: Patricia I. Pruett

review: The Firestick works exactly like the Amazon Fire box. It is good for wall mounted TV's.
author: Dennis L

review: Just love it.  Easy to install. Got Netflix working.
author: Cheryl A. Lemon

review: Little brother to the Fire Box works just as good
author: bobwire

review: Excellent product and very easy to use. Connects to wireless intranet very quickly and streams seamlessly. Picture quality is as good as any blu-ray.
author: Alan W. Patterson

review: It is excellent to have such a wide variety and quantity of entertainment options at your fingertips.
author: Loriel

review: I like that I can travel with it and connect to any wifi, ie. hotel, relatives, and enjoy.
author: Celeste Bowman
